title: The Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/2/21
itunes:title: The Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/2/21
description:
George Noory and author Mariel Forde Clarke explore her enlightenment when she died during surgery, what happened during this near death experience, and what she learned about forgiveness and healing after returning to this Earthly realm.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A discussion on belief in the afterlife, and what happens to our loved ones after they die.
